oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Heffner-Vinson Co. Girls and Gowns (Nov 18)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Carnivals; Fairs; Woodcuts (prints);
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Four color one sheet (yellow, blue, red, and orange on white) announcing the Heffner - Vinson Company presenting girls, gowns, and gales of laughter for two days starting November 18. Poster features woodcuts of women and music notes. It is likely that Hatch Show Print printed the text (the local show information), but the background artwork was probably printed by a different studio.
